comments: Mostly published as 'L.Liou' but standard form changed to 'L.Liu' at request of Fl. China team, July 2004.  Pl. Res. Gram. is a manuscript which was never published, pers. comm. Sylvia Phillips.
examples: Sclerodactylon micrandrum Keng f. & L.Liu in Acta Bot. Sin., 9: 54 (1960).
source: Index Herbariorum ed.8.  Date of death (2 June 2001) from Sylvia M. Phillips in email of 7 June 2001.
